Section.Catchline: Forcing, compelling, or coercing another to become a prostitute.

Subsection.Text: After May 1, 1943, it shall be unlawful for anyone to force, compel, or coerce another to become a prostitute.
Anyone violating this section shall be guilty of a felony of the third degree, punishable as provided in s. 775.082, s. 775.083, or s. 775.084.
